PipeOpChunk

Source: R/PipeOpChunk.R

Chunks its input into outnum chunks. Returns a list of Tasks during training, and simply passes on the input during prediction.

PipeOpChunk

Format

R6Class object inheriting from PipeOp.

Methods

  • PipeOpChunk$new(outnum, id = "chunk")
    (integer(1), character(1)) -> self
    Constructor. outnum gives the number of output channels / chunks that are created.

Parameter Set

  • shuffle :: logical(1)
    Should the data be shuffled before chunking? Default TRUE

  • stratify :: logical(1)
    Should the subsamples be stratified. Default FALSE.

See also

Other PipeOps: PipeOpEnsemble, PipeOpTaskPreproc, PipeOp, mlr_pipeop_NULL, mlr_pipeop_branch, mlr_pipeop_copy, mlr_pipeop_encode, mlr_pipeop_featureunion, mlr_pipeop_filter, mlr_pipeop_learner, mlr_pipeop_majorityvote, mlr_pipeop_modelavg, mlr_pipeop_nloptmajorityvote, mlr_pipeop_pca, mlr_pipeop_scale, mlr_pipeop_subsample, mlr_pipeop_unbranch, mlr_pipeop_undersample, mlr_pipeops

Examples

op = PipeOpChunk$new(5)
